titleStmt.title: A more exact relation of the great defeat given to Gorings army in the west; by the victorious Sr. Thomas Fairfax. Sent in a letter from Captain Blackwell, to his father in London. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Blackwell, John, Captain.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Overton in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Page numbers 4-5 are omitted in numbering only.
Dated at end: Middlesey, Iuly 11. Friday, 1645.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
